name: RANDOM rooms
description: A strange creature with a weapon and an enormous dungeon are the two ingredients of a rogue-like. Explore, discover, face new enemies. Scores of randomly generated rooms wait ahead, hiding the secret of this world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
